intro.title: Won-Buddhism of Richmond
intro.subtitle: With this Great Opening of Matter, let there be a Great Opening of Spirit.

items.title: Tai Chi at the Mechanicsville Library
items.description: Tai Chi is meditation in motion. Learn to master the powers of yin and yang to bring stability, health and vitality into your movements and mind.

items.title: Mindfulness Meditation
items.description: Mindfulness Meditation practice helps ease stress, improve memory, and all sorts of other amazing things that I am writing to fill space.

items.title: 2nd Annual Youngsan Stay in Korea
items.description: Enjoy a month long retreat in the peaceful and sacred space of Youngsan, protected by the busy city life, intended to allow participants to quiet the mind and open the heart.
